Summary: fast moving object that changed direction then disappeared and was lit up like a ball of fire.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lindsay
There were no other sightings in Lindsay on or around May 5th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife went out for a smoke and at first we thought it was a meteor passing by earth, but then it changed directions and disappeared, before my wife could run inside and get the camera, it was to fast for a plan and it didn't move like a shooting star.
